data.message: Bruz you making the new album or what I just read some fucking article saying you were collaborating with some rapper named 2chains (I aint heard of him) be interesting to hear what you come up with next you been quite been four years now since LP 2 so you got like 90 million people wondering are you back in the lab with a pen and pad or whats going on put the rumours to rest let us know brother ?
